description: A vulnerability was found in Campcodes Complete Online Beauty Parlor Management System 1.0. It has been rated as critical. Affected by this issue is some unknown functionality of the file /admin/contact-us.php. The manipulation of the argument email leads to sql injection. The attack may be launched remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. VDB-257606 is the identifier assigned to this vulnerability.

product.name: Complete Online Beauty Parlor Management System
Complete Online Beauty Parlor Management System
